attributes.action: Overrule LOCOG and force the committee to redesign the logo for the London 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Wolff-Olins designed logo has made our country a figure of ridicule around the world and NEEDS to be scrapped.

We have paid for this rubbish financially and shouldn't have to pay for the damage to our nation's culture, heritage and design acumen.

I says nothing about "Modern Britain" or our place in the world, it does say we have a nation of people who rely on committees, panels, market research organisations and polls to make a decision.

Does THIS represent our country? Our brand values? Our culture? Our heritage? I think NOT!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
